name: music-cloud-platform
description: 为编程小白设计的现代化音乐播放平台

scripts.init-db: node -e "const sqlite3 = require('sqlite3').verbose(); const db = new sqlite3.Database('./music.db'); db.serialize(() => { db.run('CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS songs (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, title TEXT, artist TEXT, file_path TEXT, created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)'); db.run('CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_songs_artist ON songs(artist)'); }); db.close(); console.log('✅ 数据库初始化完成');"
scripts.test: echo "运行测试文件..." && if exist test_uploads\test_song.mp3 (echo ✅ 测试文件存在) else (echo ⚠️ 测试文件不存在，请手动添加)
scripts.clean: if exist uploads rmdir /s /q uploads && mkdir uploads && echo ✅ 清理上传目录完成
scripts.backup: if exist music.db (copy music.db music_backup.db && echo ✅ 数据库备份完成) else (echo ⚠️ 数据库文件不存在)
scripts.help: echo 可用命令: && echo   npm start    - 启动服务器 && echo   npm run dev  - 开发模式启动 && echo   npm run setup - 安装依赖 && echo   npm run init-db - 初始化数据库 && echo   npm run test - 运行测试 && echo   npm run clean - 清理上传文件 && echo   npm run backup - 备份数据库

author: 编程小白学习项目
